name: CATSTLE
description:
A TURNBASED RPG FOR THE 7DRL GAMEJAM

PLAY AS A NAMELESS BRAVE CAT ON A QUEST TO DEFEAT THE EVIL KNIGHT SURIS TO GET BACK THE STOLEN FISH!

COLLECT FISH TO GAIN HEALTH AND SLAY THE MINIONS AND BEAT THE EVIL KNIGHT!

FEATURING MS-PAINT INSPIRED GRAPHICS MADE POSSIBLE WITH DOODLE STUDIO 95

MUSIC BY THE UNDERSCORE  ORCHESTRA 
(https://freemusicarchive.org/music/The_Underscore_Orkestra)
